messages.message: hi team - is there a reason why marketplace apps have not been published in the EU instance?

Is this the multi-tenant EU instance or a single tenant instance? For ST, this would explain it: https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-3674

But either way, we would need to run an installation script to get these apps there.

MT EU instance - no probs thanks. One of our customers thirdfort were experiencing issues with their app and I thought having the marketplace app as a reference (which should be the same and is performing well as I understand it) would be helpful for them but couldn’t find it there.
Cc @Anil as another request on this

@Anil who is the right person to generally reach out to for getting these apps published? We have a few ST customers where these are not available and maybe we can publish these there as well?
@BG \

We currently don’t have a process to do this - there is a pipeline, I am trying to figure out how to use
Will update in a day or two
thanks! Let me know how my team can help as well
